1.1.name: wordpress/follow-my-links
1.1.description:
Follow My Links is a very simple plugin that prevents WordPress from automatically adding a "rel=nofollow" attribute to the following two categories of authorial links: 1. links in the post author's comments; 2. links to the post author's URL (usually linked to from the comment author's username).

Read the full documentation at Everfluxx.com!
